mapper.select: select a_no as bno, userid, receiver, contact, postal_code as postalCode, address, extra_address as extraAddress, detail_address as detailAddress, DATE_FORMAT(writedate, '%Y-%m-%d') writedate from address order by a_no desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO address( userid, receiver, contact, postal_code, extra_address, detail_address, writedate) values (#{userid}, #{receiver}, #{conctact}, #{postalCode}, #{extraAddress}, #{detailAddress},now())
